transArray.content: Very good, the service from the lady at the front desk is very good

Dear guest, thank you for choosing us among many hotels. Thank you very much for your support and trust in our work. The transportation around the hotel is convenient, and there are many restaurants and supermarkets nearby, which can meet all your needs. The hotel also adds delivery services. There are robots, free self-service laundry, and dryers. The breakfast buffet has a complete range of Chinese and Western varieties and tastes very good. I hope you will bring your family to try it next time you stay.
